name: Noble Goes To Japan
description: In the first (possibly only) part of this visual novel parody, Noble, from the youtube channel Lost Pause, decides he wants to move to Japan and pick up some waifus. This short little game contains lots of inside jokes that you'll really appreciate if you've watched Lost Pause for a while, as well as jabs at the tropes and plot conveniances found in lots of animes and visual novels alike.
